repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of "The Working Press," the newsletter of the Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition (later known as "The Labor Coalition") from 1986 to 1996. Also included are two issues of "The Bear Facts," newsletter of U.A.W. Local 2300; one issue is from 1986 and the other is undated.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Publications #6185 PUBS. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6185: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Records 6185 P: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Photographs 6185/001: Tompkins County Labor Coalition Health and Safety Topical Files
